column2: Strike to foe's shield shoulder. Arm is useless. That must really hurt!
column4: Foe blocks your attack with his elbow. Elbow is shattered. Shield arm is useless.

column8: Strike to head kills foe, if he has no helm. If he has a helm he is knocked out for 6 hours.
column10: Strike through both of foe's lungs. Foe drops and passes out. He dies 6 rounds later.

column2: Deep wound in foe's side. Well, it looked like a killing blow.
column4: Tear open foe's side in graphic display of violence.
column6: Strike bites into foe's ribs. The impact sounds truly terrible.
column8: Major abdominal wound. Blood pours out in frightening quantities.
column10: Strike to foe's back severs a vein. Foe goes to his knees and dies in 12 rounds.

column2: Catch foe in back. He drops his guard and stumbles forward.
column4: Strike to foe's head. If foe has no helm he dies. If foe has helm, he fails to his knees.
column6: Strike impacts on foe's head. If he has no helm, he dies. Helm is destroyed.
column8: Strike through foes kidneys. Foe is down and immobile for 2 hours, then he dies.
column10: Strike plunges in just below foe's collarbone. Foe drops and dies in 12 rounds.

column2: Strike to foe's ear. Foe hears at -50.

column5: With waist armor: +7H, stun 1x, foe @ -10 | w/o: +5H, stun 1x, bleeding 3x, foe @ -25
column6: Strike to chest. If foe has plate chest armor, he drops and dies in 9 rounds. If not, he dies instantly.
column8: Strike through foe's side spills his guts on the floor. Foe fights on normally for 6 rounds, then dies.
column10: Your weapon passes through the arm and sticks out the other side. Foe dies in 12 rounds.

column2: Strike to nose. There is a permanent scar. Foe's eyes are crossed for a moment.

column6: Strike through foe's neck breaks backbone and severs spine. Foe is paralyzed from the neck down.
column8: Strike plunges into doomed foe's chest and emerges from the other side. Foe drops and dies in 6 rounds.
column10: Shot through heart sends foe reeling back 10 feet to a place suitable for death. Your weapon is stuck in reeling foe.

column2: Strike through neck. Sever vein and artery. Foe cannot breath. Foe drops and dies of heart failure.
column4: Strike plunges into foe's eye. Foe dies instantly. Foe remains standing for a moment until he realizes this.
column6: Shot through both ears proves effective. Foe dies instantly. Pretty shot.
column8: Strike through brain makes life difficult for foe. You have a half round left to act.
column10: Strike to foe's eye. Foe dies instantly. Carry on soldier.
